enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve modifying the buffer's capacity or write position, which can affect the buffer's state.
The write method also interacts with the buffer's capacity, which can be a precursor to setting a new capacity.
The setCapacity method affects the buffer's capacity, which can be verified by checking the buffered data count using getBuffered.
After setting a new capacity, the available write space can be verified using getWriteRemaining.
